name: William CURTIS, Appellant, v. Jeffrey A. BEARD, Ph.D., Commissioner, Department of Corrections, et al., Appellees

parties: William CURTIS, Appellant, v. Jeffrey A. BEARD, Ph.D., Commissioner, Department of Corrections, et al., Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of February, 2007, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
915 A.2d 640
William CURTIS, Appellant, v. Jeffrey A. BEARD, Ph.D., Commissioner, Department of Corrections, et al., Appellees.

Feb. 20, 2007.
